text: Na Pitharo o manga Yahodi: A da so manga Nasrani ko Agama ontol; go Pitharo o manga Christian: A da so manga Yahodi ko Agama ontol. A siran na Kapuphangadi-an niran so Kitab. Isha- nanan a Pitharo o siran a da-a manga mulung iyan so lagid o Katharo iran; Na so Allah i Kho- kom kiran ko Alongan a Qiyamah ko di iran Phagayonayonan
